config.john_mod.title: John Mod
config.john_mod.name_tag.tooltip: Determines the text the name tags will have. {mob_name} will be replaced with the name of the mob.
config.john_mod.armor_type.tooltip: The type of armor the John has to have to get the name tag.
config.john_mod.rendering_type.tooltip: Determines whether Johns will have their name tags rendered through walls or not.
config.john_mod.override_custom_names.to: Determines whether the mod will override any custom names you set using name tags.
